price: 1. Tout ce qui est dans les cieux et ce qui est sur terre rend gloire à Allah, le Souverain, le Très Pur, le Puissant, le Sage.
arabic: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡمَلِكِ ٱلۡقُدُّوسِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yusabbiḥu lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi al-maliki al-qudūsi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
